response: narrative=Ricky Barlow, a 17-year-old, was last seen leaving his home at 279 Milngavie Road, Glasgow after receiving a message from his friend, Margaret Briggs. The two had planned to attend a concert at a popular venue near 112-117 West Clyde Street, Helensburgh. Uncharacteristically, Ricky failed to meet Margaret at their designated spot. His foster mother grew concerned upon realizing that Ricky had not returned home the next day and reported him missing. Efforts by his foster father, with assistance from his colleague Jeffrey Smith, were in vain until police located Ricky at an address on Truce Road, safe but disoriented. The circumstances of his absence remain unexplained, raising questions among his peers and caregivers.
narrative=Ricky Barlow left his job unexpectedly, worrying his foster father. He was last seen near the youth center's playground after a concert at 112-117 West Clyde Street.
